text: Nayo bamwe bagereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu bavuga bati:- iyo Imana ibishaka ntitwari gusenga icarico cose atariyo yonyene gusa, haba twebwe canke abavyeyi bacu, canke ntitwari kubuza icarico cose atariyo yonyene, rero nivyaba ari uko bagize bamwe bari imbere yabo, mbega hoba hari hejuru y’intumwa z’Imana atari ugushikiriza ubutumwa buri k’umugaragaro gusa
